**Jade Register Ritual for Generating Divine Spirits and Aiding Transmigration Through Scripture Recitation**

**Scripture Title:** *Jade Register Ritual for Generating Divine Spirits and Aiding Transmigration Through Scripture Recitation*. One fascicle.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongxuan Section*, *Weiyi* (Ritual Propriety) category.

---

**Morning Audience**
The master stands in order within the hall.

**Ritual Proceedings**
Kneeling, the officiant declares:

*"The humble disciple [Name], in full reverence, respectfully invokes:*
*The Sovereign of the Mysterious Teachings, the Jade Clarity Radiant August Dao Lord;*
*The Lords of the Three Heavens, the Orthodox Unity Celestial Masters;*
*The Sovereign of the Numinous Treasure Teachings;*
*The Perfected Lords of the Scripture Registers and Ordination Masters;*
*The Great Dharma Masters of the Fast Supervision;*
*The Perfected Lords of the Left Palace of the Supreme Ultimate;*
*The Celestial Historians of the Nine Heavens;*
*The Sovereigns of Human and Heavenly Teachings;*
*The Perfected Lords of the Floating Canopy and Mount Fengqiu;*
*And the successive patriarchs of the Pure Subtlety, Numinous Treasure, and Orthodox Unity lineages of the Dao and its virtue.*

*With utmost devotion, I beseech your compassionate gaze to descend and witness this rite. By imperial decree, I now reverently conduct the Jade Register fast, offering this grand purification. Today, leading the assembly, I ascend the altar to recite the* Nine Heavens’ Scripture of Generating Divine Spirits from the *Wondrous Mystery Numinous Treasure* *Jade Chapters*—from the first to the third recitation—praying for the elevation of [Name]’s spirit to ascend into purity, and for the wandering souls to be universally aided in attaining rebirth.*

*Not presuming to act without authorization, I first present this humble petition. May the sacred scroll be established, and may the master’s esoteric guidance illuminate the uninitiated. May the host of Perfected Ones oversee the ordination, as if I were seated in their presence. I dare not offend the master’s solemn dignity; my heart trembles with awe and trepidation."*

The assembly ascends the altar to reverently perform the prescribed rites.

**Chanting the Dao**, they are led to stand in order before the altar.

**Descending Spirit Kings**
**Ritual Proceedings**

**The Humble Petition of [Rank and Name]**

[Rank and Name] humbly petitions the Ten Directions’ Boundless Flying Heavenly Divine Kings, the Great Sage of Eternal Life and Lord of Limitless Salvation, the Flying Heavenly Envoys, the Flying Heavenly Officers and Soldiers, and all the sacred hosts who guard the scriptures and treasures.

We have heard that when the Primordial Beginning expounded the scriptures, his merit shone through kalpas vast; when the August Sovereign of Emptiness promulgated the teachings, his grace widely extended to all sentient beings. With reverent intent, we diligently follow and recite with sincere devotion. Completing the ninefold recitation of the *Scripture of the Divine Birth*, we deliver all sunken and stagnant souls. Issuing the writs of destiny’s decree, we universally uplift spiritual consciousness; purifying the offerings of water-plants and fern, we express our utmost sincerity. The ritual assembly, in accordance with the rites, performs the fast and extends the invitation.

**Performing the Fast and Extending the Invitation**

The Boundless Flying Heavenly Divine King of the Eastern Direction descends to the altar site.
The Southern, Western, Northern, Northeastern, Southeastern, Southwestern, Northwestern, Upper, and Lower Directions likewise.

Cloud chariots—
Since the invocation was first made, we imagine the feathered standards lingering, the rainbow banners drifting in the distance. A thousand chariots and ten thousand riders surge forth, filling the sky; nine phoenixes and eight simurghs descend from heaven with resonant cries. We, in utmost devotion, offer pure tea in presentation. With this sincere memorial, we respectfully make it known.

**Proclaiming the Memorial**

The memorial is read aloud, its words resounding before the sacred audience. May the merit of the ninefold recitation be universally realized, and may all together witness the wonder of the One Vehicle. May divine souls ascend and be delivered, forever transcending into the realm of purity; may suffering spirits receive grace and fully behold the realm of radiant light. We, in boundless reverence, offer this prayer.

**Respectfully submitted.**

Ascending the altar,
Offering incense,
Bowing in faith and devotion.

Silent reverence to the master, contemplating in accordance with the Dharma.
Invoking the divine incantation:
Seven numinous spirits conceal their presence, the Three Origins merge in form.
Transforming yin and transmuting yang, outwardly pure and inwardly luminous.
Penetrating the Great Harmony, the Nine Palaces gather their essence.
Flying elixirs flourish in brilliance, refining and delivering through the Eight Gates.
Shedding the mortal coil and repelling death, the seven po dissolve and disperse.
The hundred spirits merge as one, and the myriad souls become guests of the Emperor.

Strike the Dharma drum twenty-four times.

O Most Supreme Three Heavens, Mysterious Primordial Three Qi, Supreme Dao Lord,
summon forth from within our bodies the Three and Five Merit Officers,
the Left and Right Attendants, the Incense-Bearing Golden Lads,
the Message-Conveying and Flower-Scattering Jade Maidens,
the Five Thearchs’ True Talismans, and the Direct-Day Incense Officials—
thirty-six each—forth to receive and transmit our words.

We now, with focused intent, pray that the Primordial Qi of the Supreme Ten Directions’ True and Upright Life descends,
flowing into our bodies,
that our supplications may swiftly reach the presence of the Most High and Perfect Three Treasures,
the August Jade Sovereign of the Vast Heaven,
the Eastern Ultimate Savior from Suffering, Heavenly Worthy of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Thearch,
before the Dao.

Invoking the Dharma ranks:

We, your humble servants [Name] and the ritual officers, with unified sincerity,
respectfully address and supplicate the Supreme Boundless Great Dao,
the Self-So and Natural Primordial Heavenly Worthy of the Origin;
the Jade Clarity Dao Lord;
the Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy;
the Supreme Lord Lao;
the Heavenly Worthy of the Dao and Its Virtue;
the Heavenly Worthy, Primordial Sage Who Governs Heaven;
the Heavenly Worthy Who Saves at the Sound of Suffering;
the Heavenly Worthy of the Vermilion Mound Who Delivers from Death;
the Eastern Flowery Lord Shangxiang, the Azure Lad Dao Lord;
the Western Numinous Golden Perfected, the Primordial Mother of the Myriad Qi;
the Heavenly Worthies of the Numinous Treasure Who Save from Suffering in the Ten Directions;
the Perfected Lords and Elders Who Have Attained the Dao in the Ten Directions;
the Life-Generating Thearch of the Nine Heavens;
the Thearchs of the Thirty-Two Heavens;
the Three Sovereigns and Five Elders;
the True Lords of the Five Fortunes and Ten Spirits;
the Supreme Clarity Dao Lord of the Golden Watchtower in the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace of the Mysterious Capital, Jade Metropolis;
the Upper Ministers, Upper Stewards, Upper Protectors, and Upper Instructors;
the Four Offices and Five Thearchs;
the Boundless Perfected of the Ten Directions;
the Divine Immortals of the Thirty-Six Divisions of the Venerable Scriptures;
the Sun and Moon of Supreme Clarity, the Five Planets and Four Luminaries;
the Southern Asterisms and Northern Dipper;
the Myriad Images and Lofty Perfected;
the Boundless and Immeasurable Hosts of the Perfected Great Spirits in the Ten Directions;
the Jade-Flying Celestial Spirits;
the Great Sage of Immeasurable Deliverance Who Grants Eternal Life;
the Heavenly Perfected, the Wondrously Practiced True Person;
the Great Emperors of the Three Origins;
the Nine Heavens’ Inspectors;
the Great Dharma Masters of the Mysterious Center;
the Great Dharma Masters of the Three Heavens;
the True Lords of the Three Masters of the Numinous Treasure;
the Star Lords of the Vast Heaven’s Arrayed Constellations;
the Lineage Masters of the Pure Tenuity through the Ages;
the Divine Officials of the Nine Heavens’ Bureaus;
the True Lords of the Four Saints of the Northern Ultimate;
the Upper and Lower Palace Lords of the Southern Prosperity, the Vermilion Mound’s Fire Office, and the Yellow Register’s Courtyard;
the Three Origins’ True Lords;
the True Lords Who Deliver from Death;
the True Lords of the Five Offices Who Gather the Hun-Souls of Xingsheng, Duli, Kehan, and Gongdu;
the Great Merit Kings of the Three Realms Who Attend the Scriptures and the Five Thearchs;
the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens;
the Talisman Envoys of the Nine Heavens;
the Guardians of the Nine Heavens;
all the numinous immortals;
the Sacred Thearchs of the Five Marchmounts and Five Heavens;
the True Lords Who Assist and Govern;
the Great Emperor of the Northern Darkness, Fengdu;
the Lords of the Nine Ramparts;
the Heavenly Lords of the Five Qi;
the True Lords of the Ten Palaces;
the Hundred and Twenty Offices of the Three Origins’ Palaces and their Examiners and Clerks;
the Rulers of the Ten Directions’ Nine Dark Prisons;
the Great Emperor of the Water Office, Fusan;
the Divine Lord of the Sun Valley;
the Water Thearchs of the Nine Rivers;
the True Lords of the Twelve Brooks;
the Thunder and Rain Deities of the Scriptural Registers;
the Divine Generals and Officials;
the Mighty Heavenly Enforcers and Punitive Divine Soldiers;
the Direct Talisman Officers of the Five Thearchs;
the Clerks of the Six Palaces;
the Ox-Headed Prison Guards and Horse-Faced Great Spirits;
the Courier Officials of the Mysterious Capital’s Reed Dragon Post;
the Document-Bearing Lads;
the Guardians of the Precepts;
the Direct Talismans of the Three Realms;
the Merit Officers of the Four Directions;
the City Gods and Village Earth Gods;
the Incense-Attending Numinous Officials;
the Direct Talismans Who Proclaim and Transmit Summons;
the Responsive and Perceptive Spirits of the Three Realms;
all the mighty and numinous beings.

We have heard that the original chapters of the Numinous Treasure
encompass the profound mysteries of the hundred demons’ hidden rhymes,
while the wondrous canon of the Cavernous Mystery
unfolds the majestic ritual of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Thearch.

The divine merit equals that of Heaven and Earth,
its vast kindness is true and real—
the living and the dead alike receive its grace,
this is the supreme model,
universally delivering without end.

Now, in reverent compliance with the imperial edict,
we have undertaken the grand jiao of the Jade Register for many days and nights.
Today, ascending the altar to recite in rotation
the *Cavernous Mystery Numinous Treasure Jade Chapters of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Thearch*,
we offer ascent and recommendation for the spirit of so-and-so,
that they may attain fruition and wander carefree,
while aiding the suffering souls of the departed,
all equally achieving rebirth in the proper realm.

As this ritual is solemnly arrayed,
the jade caskets are about to be opened.
We respectfully present this memorial,
humbly beseeching your august observation.

We pray that the Three Realms’ exalted luminaries,
the Nine Heavens’ supreme sages,
will together bestow their mysterious blessings,
universally granting vast favor.
Condescend to descend upon this ritual arena,
witnessing our vows and accepting our devotion.

Throughout the ten directions of the Dharma Realm,
the six directions of the cosmos,
the beings of the Five Paths,
the prisons of the Nine Dark Realms—
may these merits be universally employed for adornment.

May it be that the scriptural treasures widely propagate,
the gates of darkness cease their trials.
Pure souls receive grace and ascend beyond the Dao’s shore,
suffering spirits undergo refinement and forever depart the Yellow Springs.
Grievances are dissolved,
the roots of sin eradicated.
Swiftly may perfection be achieved in the Dao’s fruit,
and immediate deliverance attained in the Crimson Palace.

We bow our heads and take refuge in the boundless Great Dao.

*Respectfully presented by the scripture-attending acolytes:*
*The Three Refuges.*

**Hymn of Past Lives**
*Attending the Scripture, Opening the Sutra*
**Hymn of Seating the Assembly**
*Silent Contemplation in Accordance with the Dharma*
In profound stillness, we reach the ultimate source—
**Inviting the Turning of the Dharma Wheel**
The master inscribes the sutra,
the assembly chants its completion.
*Attending the Scripture, Dedication of Merit*
**Hymn of Rising from the Seat**
Proceeding in void-step, circling to the Palace of Zi,
offering incense.

The master declares:
We humbly acknowledge that your station guards the Palace of Kan,
overseeing the courts of ghosts and spirits;
your majestic power, O Spirit of the Zi, holds authority over sin and fortune.
Radiating through the five qi, you pity the multitudes sunk in suffering.
Today, in reverent obedience to the imperial decree,
we uphold the jade registers in solemn rite,
ascending and recommending the soul of [Name],
to transcend into purity and stillness,
while aiding the suffering spirits,
that all may equally attain rebirth in the realms of life.

Now, the recitation of the sacred verses has been completed in full.
We pray that your mysterious grace be abundantly bestowed,
delivering the suffering spirits to transcendence.
May you deign to receive our earnest supplications
and grant your saving mercy.
Let the Three Wretched Paths open to prosperity,
the Five Sufferings cease their bitterness.
May the dark night brighten with light,
and all cross to the farther shore.

A memorial is prepared—
we shall now proclaim it.

**Proclamation of the Memorial**
We reverently invoke the Heavenly Envoy of Youtan,
Bearer of the Tang Talisman,
to swiftly step forth and receive this official document.

**Proclamation of the Petition**
[The memorial is] consigned to the flames.

**Assisting the Sutra—Opening the Sutra**
*Spreading the Seat—Hymn of Praise*
*Inviting the Turning of the Dharma Wheel*
The Master Inscribes the Sutra
The Assembly Recites the Sutra to Completion
*Assisting the Sutra—Dedication of Merit*
*Chanting While Rising—Procession to the Kun Palace*
Offering Incense
The Master Presents the Memorial

We humbly recall:
Here, at the station of the Three,
one abides in the realm of benevolence and stillness.
The virtue of Kun flows at its center,
disseminating the yang qi of Brahma.
Delivering beings and benefiting creatures,
reviving the dead and restoring life.

Now, in reverent compliance with the imperial decree,
we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites,
elevating and recommending the spirit of [Name],
advancing them to purity and tranquility,
extending aid to suffering souls,
that all may equally attain rebirth in the realms of life.

The recitation of the sacred verses has now been completed in full.
We respectfully proclaim the decree of grace,
praying for the deliverance of divine souls.
May you deign to descend great compassion
and heed the pleas of mortals.
Let the netherworld open to prosperity,
and the fruits of the Dao be perfected.

A memorial is prepared—
we shall now proclaim it.

**Proclamation of the Memorial**
We reverently invoke the Celestial Envoy of the Uppermost Meditation,
Bearer of the Liu Talisman of Boundless Longevity,
to swiftly step forth and receive this official document.

**Proclamation of the Petition**
[The memorial is] consigned to the flames.

*Spreading the Seat—Hymn of Praise*
*Inviting the Turning of the Dharma Wheel*
The Master Inscribes the Sutra
The Assembly Recites the Sutra to Completion

*Chanting While Rising*

**Procession of the Void**

Proceeding in circular motion to the *Zhen* Palace, offering incense.

**The Master Recites the Memorial**

We humbly acknowledge: dwelling in the *Mao* position, all sentient beings bathe in the profound grace; virtue aligning with the *Zhen* Palace, both hidden and manifest draw upon the great transformation. Responding to directions and bearing titles, boundlessly delivering humanity.

Today, in reverent compliance with the imperial decree, we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites, ascending to recommend the soul of [Name], that they may transcend to purity and stillness, while aiding suffering spirits to equally attain the realm of life.

Now, the recitation of the precious scripture has completed its third cycle. We respectfully proclaim the decree of grace, praying for the deliverance of divine souls. May it ascend to the azure heavens, and may compassion descend to heed our sincere plea—witnessing the covenant, opening the path of deliverance, and rescuing the netherworld.

A memorial is prepared—we shall now proclaim it.

**Proclamation of the Memorial**
We reverently invoke the Celestial Overseer of the Brahma Realm, Bearer of the Yellow Talisman of the *Xu Yan* Heaven, to swiftly step forth and receive this official document.

**Proclamation of the Petition**
[The memorial is] consigned to the flames.

**Threefold Recitation of the Sutra**
**Restoring the Deities—Burning Incense**

Immortal spirits and immortal officials, Golden Lads and Jade Maidens, the Five Emperors and Five Marchmounts, divine immortals and perfected beings, the Three *Qi* True Deities, the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords, celestial and terrestrial immortals, the Five Numinous Incense Officials—we now summon the ten directions’ true *qi*, that the golden liquid elixir, cinnabar mushrooms, and azure herbs may spontaneously arise.

May the hundred spirits and host of perfected ones gather here before the incense burner. May we, your servants, who study the Dao attain the Dao, and those who seek immortality attain immortality.

May the jade maidens and immortal lads of the ten directions attend the incense smoke, swiftly conveying the sincerity of our supplications to the supreme and most true Three Treasures, the August Jade Emperor of the Vast Heaven, the Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from the Eastern Extremity, and the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Emperor of the Dao.

**Descending the Altar**
**Thanks to the Master**

Your subordinate, [Name], humbly addresses the Lord of the Mystic Teachings, the Jade Clarity August Sovereign of the Dao, the Three Heavens’ Lord and Master of the Orthodox Unity, the Heavenly Master Perfected Lord; the Lord of the Numinous Treasure Teachings, the Perfected Lord of Scriptures and Ordination; the Great Dharma Master and Overseer of the Retreat; the Perfected Lord of the Left Palace of the Supreme Ultimate; the Perfected Lord of the Grand Historian of the Nine Provinces’ Immortals; the Lord of the Teachings of Heaven and Humankind, the Perfected Lord of Hua Gai and Fu Qiu; and the successive masters of the Orthodox Unity of the Pure Subtlety and Moral Dao.

We reverently beseech your compassion to graciously accept our gratitude. Just now, ascending the altar, we chanted the Jade Chapters of the Life-Generating Deities of the Nine Heavens, praying for the elevation of the soul of [Name] to purity and stillness, and for the deliverance of all orphaned and hidden spirits of the Dharma realm from the depths of darkness, ascending to the immortal realms.

Having completed the third recitation under the guidance of the presiding master, we now offer our thanks, trusting that the rite may be brought to perfect fulfillment. May every blessing be bestowed, all entering the gate of life’s deliverance. As the recitation of the scripture remains unfinished, we briefly delay the immortal retinue’s departure.

At noon, the rites proceed—we shall make further supplications.

Our hearts, in utmost reverence and gratitude, cannot be fully expressed.

Respectfully submitted.

**Thus Concludes**

At the Hour of Noon, the assembly gathers in the Master’s Hall, arrayed in proper order. The ritual proceedings commence—we kneel to make our supplication.

Now, as the Great Sun shines with radiant clarity, its light suffusing the threefold qi’s hidden depths; as the celestial retinue descends to the mortal realm, we envision the hosts of all heavens assembled in perfect harmony.

We, your humble disciples [Names], hereby reverently address the Sovereign of the Mystic Teaching, the Jade Clarity August Dao Lord; the Three Heavens’ Sovereign, the Orthodox Unity Celestial Master; the Sovereign of the Numinous Treasure, the Perfected Lord of Scriptures and Ordinations; the Great Dharma Master and Overseer of the Fast; the Perfected Lord of the Left Palace of the Supreme Ultimate; the Perfected Lord and Grand Scribe of the Nine Provinces; the Sovereign of Human and Heavenly Teachings, the Hua Gai Perfected Lord of Floating Hill; and the successive masters of the Qingwei, Lingbao, and Orthodox Unity traditions.

We humbly beseech your compassion, that you may deign to turn your penetrating gaze upon us.

In reverent compliance with the sacred edict, we now conduct the grand jiao offering, ascending the altar to recite the *Jade Chapters of the Life-Generating Deities of the Nine Heavens* from the fourth to the sixth passage. We pray for the elevation of the soul of [Name] to the realms of blessedness, and for the deliverance of all orphaned spirits of the Dharma realm from the depths of darkness, ascending to the pure domains.

Not presuming upon our own authority, we make this further supplication.

May the seven-jeweled platform of the scriptures ever behold the luxuriant splendor of the Purple Void; may the cavern-palaces of the Three Clarities distantly gaze upon the boundless expanse of the Brahma-qi.

We, your unworthy disciples, dare to trespass upon your august dignity, our hearts overwhelmed with awe and trepidation.

Now, leading the assembly, we ascend the altar to perform the sacred rites in due order.

**Chanting the Dao, we ascend the altar.**

Kindling the incense, we offer reverent obeisance and silent veneration to the Master, contemplating in accordance with the ritual.

We invoke the divine incantation:
At the dawn of the Primordial, the Great Mystery first stirred.
From the Void’s extremity, formless, a single qi flowed into shape.
It transformed into the Two Radiant Ones, the Five Wefts congealed in essence.
Merging with the spontaneous, it dissolved the knots of the womb.
Assembling the perfected, it spread its radiance, resplendent through the Nine Purities.
The Flaming Pool expanded in splendor, the Seven Chronograms aligned with the Well.
We beseech Master Lu Hao, whose essence illumines the Cinnabar Heavens.
Crimson light refines and elevates, scarlet mists disperse their brilliance.
The Three Flowers flourish in luxuriance, their radiance reflecting upon the Imperial Divine Seat.

Striking the ritual drum twenty-four times.

O Most Supreme Three Heavens, Mysterious Primordial Three Qi, Supreme Dao Lord of the Great Dao:
Summon forth from within our bodies the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendants of the Left and Right, the Golden Lads of Incense, the Jade Maidens of Flower-Scattering and Message-Bearing, the Five Thearchs’ Direct Envoys and the Daily Fragrance Officials—thirty-six each—commanding them to transmit our words.

We now enter our intention, praying that the Upright Qi of the Ten Directions, the Perfected and True, descend and flow into our bodies, that our supplications may swiftly ascend to the presence of the Most Supreme and Perfect Three Treasures, the August Jade Thearch of the Vast Heaven, the Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from the Eastern Pole, and the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Thearch.

Announcing the ritual rank:

We, your humble servants [Name] and the ritual officers, with unified sincerity, reverently address and supplicate the Most Supreme Boundless Dao, the Spontaneous and Natural Primordial Heavenly Worthy of Original Commencement; the Jade Clarity Dao Lord; the Heavenly Worthy of Numinous Treasure; the Most Supreme Lord Lao, the Heavenly Worthy of Dao and Virtue; the Heavenly Worthy of the Primordial Sage Who Governs All; the Heavenly Worthy of Salvation at the Sound of Suffering; the Heavenly Worthy of the Crimson Mound Who Delivers from Mortality; the Azure Lad Dao Lord, Grand Minister of the Eastern Florescence; the Primordial Sovereign Mother of Myriad Qi, the Golden Perfected of the Western Numinosity; the Heavenly Worthies of Salvation and Numinous Treasure in the Ten Directions; the Perfected Lords and Venerable Masters Who Have Attained the Dao in the Ten Directions; the Life-Generating Thearch of the Nine Heavens; the Thearchs of the Thirty-Two Heavens; the Three Sovereigns and Five Elders; the True Lords of the Five Fortunes and Ten Spirits; the Perfected Lord of the Luminous Capital, the Numinous Treasure and Perfect Radiant August Dao Lord of the Seven-Jeweled Mysterious Terrace of the Golden Towers of the Jade Metropolis in the Purple Tenuity Supreme Palace; the Grand Ministers, Grand Stewards, Grand Protectors, and Grand Tutors; the Four Offices and Five Thearchs; the Boundless and Perfect in the Ten Directions; the Divine Immortals of the Thirty-Six Sacred Scriptures; the Perfected of the Supreme Clarity’s Sun and Moon, the Five Planets and Four Luminaries, the Southern Asterism and Northern Dipper, and the Myriad Images of Lofty Perfection; the Boundless and Measureless Grades of Perfect and True Great Spirits in the Ten Directions; the Flying Heavenly Spirit-Kings; the Great Sage of Limitless Salvation Who Grants Eternal Life; the Heavenly Perfected and August Person, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct; the Three Primordials and Three Officials, the Great Thearchs; the Envoys of Investigation in the Nine Heavens; the Great Dharma Masters of the Mysterious Center; the Great Dharma Masters of the Three Heavens; the Perfected Lords of the Three Masters of Numinous Treasure; the Star Perfected of the Myriad Constellations; the Master Lords of Successive Generations of the Pure Tenuity; the Sacred Worthies of the Nine Heavenly Bureaus; the Four Perfected Lords of the Northern Culmen; the Perfected Lords of the Upper and Lower Palaces of Southern Prosperity, the Crimson Mound Fire Mansion, and the Yellow Register Court; the True Lords Who Deliver from Death; the True Lords of the Five Offices Who Gather the Solitary and Orphaned Souls; the Great Merit Kings of the Three Realms; the Five Thearchs Who Attend the Scriptures; the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens; the Talisman Envoys of the Nine Heavens; the Guardians of the Nine Heavens; all the Numinous Immortals; the Sacred Thearchs of the Five Marchmounts and Five Heavens, the True Lords Who Assist and Govern; the Great Thearch of the Northern Darkness of Fengdu; the Lords of the Nine Ramparts; the Heavenly Lords of the Five Qi; the True Lords of the Ten Palaces; the Hundred and Twenty Bureaus of the Three Primordial Palaces and their Examiners and Clerks; the Wardens of the Prisons in the Nine Glooms of the Ten Directions; the Great Thearch of the Waters’ Mulberry Fields; the Spirit Lord of the Sunrise Valley; the Water Thearchs of the Nine Rivers; the Perfected of the Twelve Brooks; the Divine Officials, Lords, Generals, and Clerks of the Thunder, Rain, and Lightning Departments; the Mighty Heavenly Warriors Who Execute Punishments; the Direct Envoys of the Five Thearchs; the Clerks of the Six Palaces; the Ox-Headed Gaolers and Horse-Faced Great Spirits; the Courier Officials of the Mysterious Metropolis’ Reed Dragon Post; the Lads Who Bear the Tallies; the Guardians of the Precepts; the Direct Envoys of the Three Realms; the Four Direct Merit Officers; the City Gods and Village Deities; the Numinous Officials Who Attend the Incense; the Direct Envoys Who Proclaim and Transmit Commands—may all those responsive to invocation in the Three Realms, all majestic numina, attend and heed.

We have heard that the Golden Writ of the Three Treasures congeals the wondrous qi of the Empty Mystery, and that the Jade Tablets of the Nine Empyreans conceal the numinous sounds of the Cavernous Void.

Within, the names blend with the hundred spirits, while the roots of life are shaped and perfected among the ten thousand kinds. Guiding the course of governance, chanting reverence and offering, the nine qi coalesce into form; riding the dawn’s rare yang, penetrating the mysterious numinous, the Seven Origins return their radiance.

Vast is the Primal Beginning, congealing the wondrous and void. Moved by the end of the ninefold tread, it pities the responsive convergence of the threefold enclosure. Divine luminance unfolds its mysteries, hidden tones bridge the profound. Above, it opens the light of heaven and earth; below, it measures the transformations of death and life. So subtle it reaches the ultimate of the formless, so elusive it defies surpassing. Gazing upon its towering virtue and power, we exhaust our earnest devotion.

Now, reverently heeding the imperial decree, we have solemnly observed the Jade Register Grand Fast for several days and nights. Today, ascending the altar, we intone the *Nine Heavens’ Life-Giving Divine Chapters of the Cavernous Mystery Numinous Treasure*, offering ascent and presentation for such-and-such a spirit, that they may attain fruition and carefree wandering, while aiding suffering souls and universally fostering life in all directions.

We humbly pray that compassionate light may illumine the scene, and the darkest depths flow with splendor. May the Jade Terrace release its forbidden script, permitting song and recitation; may the Golden Lattice open its treasured verses, allowing chant and ode. Let the resonant tones ring clear to the nine distances, and the fragrant clarity be heard throughout the Three Realms. Thus may such-and-such a spirit’s nature transcend the gates of death, their qi return to its original root. Riding the jade tones of Great Possession, they shall ascend the jeweled realm of the Wondrous and Non-Being.

We, your servants, bow our heads in homage and take refuge in the Boundless Great Dao.

*Attending the Scripture, we recite the White Text;*
*The Three Refuges;*
*The Praise of Past Lives;*
*Attending the Scripture, we open the sutra;*
*The Praise of the Dharma Seat;*
*Silent contemplation as prescribed;*
*Requesting the Turning of the Dharma Wheel;*
*The Master inscribes the sutra;*
*The assembly recites the sutra to its close;*
*Attending the Scripture, we dedicate the merit;*
*The Chant of the Seat’s Dissolution.*

Procession in void-step, circling to the Xun Palace, offering incense.
The Master recites the White Text:

We have heard that this station guards the Xun Palace, corresponding above to the Divine Empyrean’s realm; the Gate of Earth in the Grove of Blessings, connecting below to the boundless expanse of the Dark and Vast. Countless souls are delivered as teachings are established in every quarter.

Today, in reverent compliance with the imperial decree, we perform the rites of the Jade Register, ascending to recommend such-and-such a spirit, advancing them to purity and stillness, universally aiding the suffering souls, that all may equally attain the realm of life.

Now the recitation of the precious scripture has completed its fourth cycle. Respectfully we proclaim the decree of grace, beseeching deliverance for the souls of the dead.

We humbly pray that you look down with compassion, bestowing the great workings of the mysterious creation. May the true transformation be made manifest, fulfilling our earnest prayers.

A memorial document is prepared; we now proceed to its proclamation.

Proclamation of the Memorial.
We reverently invite the Silent Penfu Messenger of the Doushu Heaven to swiftly step forth and receive the official document.

Proclamation of the Pass.
Burning and offering.

Attending the Scripture, we open the sutra;
The Praise of the Dharma Seat;
Requesting the Turning of the Dharma Wheel;
The Master inscribes the sutra;
The assembly recites the sutra to its close;
Attending the Scripture, we dedicate the merit;
The Chant of the Seat’s Dissolution.

Procession in void-step, circling to the Center, offering incense.
The Master recites the White Text:

We have heard that the Dao, like the heavens above, alone governs life and death...

Virtue, like the vaulted heavens, weighs the lightness and heaviness of sin and blessing. In compassion for the wandering souls of the departed, we pray for their deliverance from the dark gates.

Now, in reverent obedience to the sacred edict, we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites, ascending and recommending the spirit of [Name], that they may ascend to purity and stillness, while extending aid to suffering souls, that all may together attain rebirth in the living realm. Today, the recitation of the precious scripture has been completed five times. We present the true talisman and proclaim its decree, praying for the bestowal of gracious blessings and their wide dissemination.

We humbly beseech that the returning chariot deign to look upon us, responding to each according to their measure. May all those bound in confinement ascend to the heavens of freedom.

A memorial document is prepared; we now proceed to its proclamation.

Proclamation of the Memorial.
We reverently invite the Undefiled Joy of the Pāramitā Heaven’s Fanfu Messenger to swiftly step forth and receive the official document.

Proclamation of the Pass.
Burning and offering.

Attending the Scripture, we open the sutra;
The Praise of the Dharma Seat;
Requesting the Turning of the Dharma Wheel;
The Master inscribes the sutra;
The assembly recites the sutra to its close;
Attending the Scripture, we dedicate the merit;
The Chant of the Seat’s Dissolution.

Procession in void-step, circling to the Qian Palace, offering incense.
The Master recites the White Text:

We have heard that majesty aids the workings of heaven, dwelling in the realm of boundless virtue and blessings; virtue expands the movement of the heavens, delivering souls from the hells of countless kalpas. Transformations respond to all heavens, and merits are bestowed without measure.

Now, in reverent obedience to the sacred edict, we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites, ascending and recommending the spirit of [Name], that they may transcend to purity and stillness, while extending aid to suffering souls, that all may together attain rebirth in the living realm. Today, the recitation of the precious scripture has been completed six times. Relying on the profound grace, we proclaim the decree, praying for the vast bestowal of sacred blessings.

We humbly beseech that the Great Dao extend its compassion, and the divine radiance illuminate all. May the long night be fully enlightened, and all be delivered to the immortal realm.

A memorial document is prepared; we now proceed to its proclamation.

Proclamation of the Memorial.
We reverently invite the Resonant Transformation of the Dongyuan Heaven’s Zhangfu Messenger to swiftly step forth and receive the official document.

Proclamation of the Pass.
Burning and offering.

Upon the third recitation of the scripture, we restore the deities and burn incense. May the immortal spirits and immortal officials, the Golden Lads and Jade Maidens, the Perfected of the Five Thearchs and Five Marchmounts, the True Persons of the Three Qi, the Lords of the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger, the Heavenly and Earthly Immortals, and the Five Numinous Incense Officials now summon the orthodox qi of the ten directions, that the golden liquid elixir and azure mushroom of immortality may spontaneously arise. Let the hundred numinous hosts of Perfected gather here before the incense burner. May we, your servants, who study the Dao attain the Dao, and those who seek immortality attain immortality. May the Jade Maidens and Immortal Lads of the ten directions attend the incense smoke, conveying the sincerity of our supplications to the Most High and Perfect Three Treasures, the August Jade Thearch of the Vast Heaven, the Heavenly Worthy of Salvation of the Eastern Culmen, and the Ninefold Heavenly Thearch of Life before the Dao.

Descending from the altar, we offer thanks to the master. Though we have not observed the three-day retreat, we have been graced with the fortune of this audience. What we now declare pertains to the Two Mysteries, for the ritual protocols truly derive from the master-disciple transmission. We, your humble servant [Name], now address the Lord of the Dao in the Mystic Realm, the Jade Clarity August Sovereign of the Dao, the Lord of the Three Heavens, the Orthodox Unity Heavenly Master Perfected Lord, the Lord of the Numinous Treasure, the Perfected Lord of the Scriptures and Registers, the Great Dharma Master Perfected Lord who Oversees the Retreat, the Perfected Lord of the Left Palace of the Great Ultimate, the Perfected Lord of the Grand Historian of the Nine Provinces, the Lord of the Teaching of Humans and Devas, the Perfected Lord of the Floating Canopy of Mount Fuqiu, and the successive masters of the Orthodox Unity and Pristine Subtlety traditions. We reverently beseech your compassionate regard and humbly express our gratitude.

We have just ascended the altar to intone the Jade Chapters of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Scripture, praying for the elevation of the soul of [Name] to purity and stillness, and for the deliverance of all solitary and obscure beings in the dharma-realm from the depths of darkness, that they may ascend to the immortal realm. Through your august support, we have completed six recitations. We now offer our earnest thanks, relying upon your aid to bring this rite to completion. May no detail remain obscure, and may all Perfected Ones oversee the deliverance. As the recitation of the scripture nears its end, we pray for the flourishing of our Dao. At the close of this day, we shall perform the remaining rituals and present our humble devotion. Our hearts are filled with utmost reverence and gratitude.

Thus we respectfully declare. As before.

At the Evening Audience, the masters assemble in the hall in proper order. The ritual proceedings commence; we kneel and declare:

As the sun pauses in the heavens of all directions, the turning wheel afar listens to the cranes’ songs in the void; as the five-colored clouds interweave, the chariot reverently awaits the phoenix’s cry beneath the feathered canopy. Thrice have we invoked the Venerable Masters, ever adhering to the canonical rites.

We, your disciples, [Names], in all due reverence, address the Supreme Master of the Mysterious Center, the Jade Clarity August Sovereign of the Dao; the Three Heavens’ Supreme Master, the Orthodox Unity Celestial Master Perfected Lord; the Numinous Treasure Supreme Master, the Perfected Lord of Scriptures and Ordination; the Great Dharma Master Perfected Lord who Oversees the Fast; the Perfected Lord of the Left Palace of the Supreme Ultimate; the Perfected Lord of the Nine Provinces’ Immortal Historiographer; the Supreme Master of Human and Heavenly Teachings, the Perfected Lord Fuqiu of the Flowery Canopy; and all successive Venerable Masters of the Pure Tenuity, Numinous Treasure, and Orthodox Unity traditions.

We humbly beseech your compassion, that you may deign to turn your penetrating gaze upon us. Now, in reverent compliance with your august decree, we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites to offer and exalt this grand fast. Today, as the assembly ascends the altar to recite the *Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Jade Chapters of the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure* from the seventh to the ninth recitation, we pray for the elevation of the soul of [Name] to purity and stillness, and for all solitary spirits in the dharma-realm to together realize their good causes, ascend to Perfection, and attain deliverance. Daring not act on our own, we once more present this declaration. We humbly implore your divine aid to uphold and guide us from beginning to end.

May we reverently beseech the transmission of the esoteric secrets never imparted to the uninitiated, that the subtle be revealed and the profound be expounded; may the gates of deliverance for the divine souls be flung open, and the radiant light be turned back to guide their return. We await your august command to proclaim and intone the sacred chapters.

Daring to presume beneath the awe of your majesty, we below are overwhelmed with trepidation. Leading the assembly to ascend the altar, we reverently perform the prescribed rites:

**Chanting the Dao, ascending the altar, offering incense, making the pledge, bowing in silence to the masters, and contemplating as prescribed.**

We invoke the proclamation of the divine incantations—**the Most Supreme Perfected, the Great Sage and Lofty Venerables**—who spread transformation and circulate qi through the Thirty-Two Heavens. The Eight Assemblies and Nine Luminances naturally form their script, stabilizing heaven and earth and safeguarding the kalpas. The primordial mandate of the Originator is universally proclaimed to the Three Primes; below, it commands the Nine Earths, above, it seals the myriad heavens, and in the center, it announces to the seas and mountains, the great peaks and rivers. Today, we make this supreme declaration, and all spirits hear it. As we perform the fast and practice the Dao, we deliver the hidden souls. The Three Officials and Nine Bureaus eradicate their evil roots, forever liberating them from the Three Paths and the source of the Five Sufferings. Generation after generation, they receive blessings, their names inscribed in the cinnabar registers. Their spirits ascend to the heavens, refined and transformed by nature. The gates of life and death are opened for their deliverance, granting them eternal years through countless kalpas. The Nine Heavens’ mandate is transmitted by wind and fire couriers.

**Strike the dharma drum twenty-four times.**

**The Most Supreme Three Heavens’ Mysterious Originator, the Three Qi’s Most High Dao Lord**, summon forth from within our bodies the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Left and Right Attendants, the Incense-Bearing Golden Lads, the Message-Transmitting and Flower-Scattering Jade Maidens, the Five Thearchs’ Direct Envoys, and the Day-Officers of the Incense Bureau—thirty-six of each—to emerge. Let those who emerge be arrayed in solemn attire, and let the words we speak be conveyed without delay.

We now set our intention, praying that the life-generating qi of the Ten Directions’ Orthodox Perfected may descend and flow into our bodies, so that our supplications may swiftly reach the presence of the **Most Supreme Perfected Three Treasures, the August Jade Thearch of the Vast Heaven, the Heavenly Worthy of the Eastern Ultimate Who Saves from Suffering, and the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Thearch of the Dao**.

**Announce the dharma ranks.**

We, your humble servants, [Name] and the ritual officers, together with utmost sincerity, reverently address the **Most High Limitless Dao, the Void and Spontaneous Originator Heavenly Worthy of Primordial Beginning; the Jade Clarity Dao Lord; the Heavenly Worthy of Numinous Treasure; the Most High Lord Lao, the Heavenly Worthy of Power and Virtue; the Heavenly Worthy Who Governs the Primordial Origin of All Under Heaven; the Heavenly Worthy Who Saves from Suffering at the Sound of a Cry; the Heavenly Worthy of the Cinnabar Mound Who Delivers Lives; the Eastern Florescence Lord of Wood, the Prime Minister Azure Lad Dao Lord; the Western Numinosity Golden Perfection, the Primordial Mother of the Myriad Qi; the Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions Who Save from Suffering through Numinous Treasure; the Great Sage Perfected of the Ten Directions Who Have Attained the Dao; the Host of Venerable Perfected Lords and Elders; the Life-Generating Thearch of the Nine Heavens; the Thearchs of the Thirty-Two Heavens; the Three Sovereigns and Five Elders; the True Lords of the Five Fortunes and Ten Spirits; the Dao Lord of the Luminous Perfection of Numinous Treasure, Supreme August Sovereign of the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace in the Seven-Treasured Mysterious Terrace of the Jade Capital of the Dark Metropolis; the Prime Ministers, Grand Councillors, Protectors, and Instructors; the Four Offices and Five Thearchs; the Limitless Perfected of the Ten Directions; the Divine Immortals of the Thirty-Six Divisions of Venerable Scriptures; the Nine Luminaries of the Upper Clarity’s Sun and Moon; the Southern Asterisms and Northern Dipper; the Myriad Images’ Lofty Perfected; the Boundless Hosts of the Ten Directions’ Limitless Grades of Perfected Great Spirits; the Flying Heavenly Spirit Kings, the Great Sages of Eternal Life, the Boundless Lords Who Deliver Humanity; the Heavenly Perfected Sovereigns, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct; the Three Primes and Three Officials Great Emperors; the Nine Heavens’ Investigating Envoys; the Great Dharma Masters of the Mysterious Center; the Great Dharma Masters of the Three Heavens; the Three Masters of Numinous Treasure; the Perfected of the Constellations Arrayed Across the Heavens; the Perfected Masters of Successive Generations of the Orthodox Unity; the Sacred Worthies of the Nine Heavens’ Offices and Bureaus; the Four Sacred Perfected of the Northern Ultimate; the Lords of the Upper and Lower Palaces of Southern Prosperity, the Cinnabar Mound’s Fire Mansion, and the Yellow Register’s Court; the Three Prime True Lords Who Govern the Yellow Register; the True Lords Who Deliver Lives and Grant Immortality; the True Lords of the Five Mansion Who Gather the Solitary Souls of the Departed; the Great Merit Kings of the Three Realms; the Five Thearchs Who Attend the Scriptures; the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens; the Envoys of the Nine Heavens’ Talismans; the Nine Heavens’ Guards; all the numinous immortals; the Sacred Thearchs of the Five Peaks and Five Heavens; the True Lords Who Assist and Govern; the Great Emperor of the Northern Darkness of Fengdu; the Lords of the Nine Ramparts; the Heavenly Lords of the Five Qi; the True Lords of the Ten Palaces; the Hundred and Twenty Offices of the Three Prime Palaces and their Examiners, Clerks, and Scribes; the Rulers of the Ten Directions’ Nine Dark Prisons; the Great Emperor of the Mulberry Tree of the Water Mansion; the Spirit Lord of the Sunrise Valley; the Water Thearchs of the Nine Rivers; the Perfected of the Twelve Brooks; the Divine Officials, Lords, Generals, and Clerks of the Thunder, Lightning, and Rain Departments; the Registers of the Dharma; the Mighty Heavenly Warriors Who Execute Punishments; the Divine Soldiers; the Direct Envoys of the Five Thearchs; the Clerks of the Six Palaces; the Ox-Headed Prison Guards; the Horse-Faced Great Spirits; the Courier Clerks of the Mysterious Metropolis’ Reed Dragon Post; the Lads Who Bear the Documents; the Guardians of the Precepts; the Mighty Spirits; the Direct Envoys of the Three Realms; the Four Direct Merit Officers; the City Gods and Village Earth Gods; the Incense-Attending Numinous Officials; the Direct Envoys Who Proclaim and Transmit Summons; the Responsive and Perceptive Spirits of the Three Realms; and all the majestic numina.**

We have heard that when the Dragon Han first unfolded its chart, the Jade Vault expanded across the Five Primes; when the Crane’s cry governed the kalpa, golden scriptures wove through the Three Numinous Ones.

At the inception of Azure Perfection, wondrous tones revolved tenfold; as the Void’s Azure congealed in truth, jade-like sounds resounded nine times. Unfolding divine works through warp and weft, manifesting purple qi amid the dark and yellow. Phoenix-script illumines in circling radiance, jasper towers stand as flying celestials’ guard; dragon-chapters blaze in splendor, the Purple Palace unfolds its treasury of prohibitions’ store. As the compassionate ferry across the sea of suffering, truly the kindling torch upon the darkened thoroughfare. All who offer sincere prayers must rely on the profound grace.

Now, in reverent compliance with the imperial edict, we have solemnly observed the Jade Register Grand Fast for several days and nights. Today, ascending the altar, we chant and intone the *Dongxuan Lingbao Jiutian Shengshen Yuzhang*, ascending to present the spirit of so-and-so, that they may be reborn in the blessed realm above, and that the lonely and hidden below may equally attain the realm of life. We humbly pray that all ten directions be encompassed, all myriad beings be uplifted. May the soul ascend to the jeweled realm, the hidden and forlorn be cleansed in the cold spring. May they, by the true vehicle’s power, swiftly dissolve deluded karma.

We, your servants, bow our heads in homage, taking refuge in the Boundless Dao.

*Attending the Scriptures: White Text*
*Three Refuges*
*Eulogy of Past Lives*
*Attending the Scriptures: Opening the Sutra*
*Eulogy for Seating*
*Silent Contemplation in Proper Form*
*Request to Turn the Dharma Wheel*
*Master Inscribes the Sutra*
*Assembly Recites the Sutra to Completion*
*Attending the Scriptures: Dedication*
*Chant Upon Rising from the Seat*

Proceeding in void-step, circumambulating to the Palace of Dui, offering incense.

*The Master intones the White Text:*
We humbly recall: standing in the Hall of Blessings, one may broadly unfold compassionate transformation; bestowing the grace of Dui’s marsh, one ever universally delivers divine souls. The hidden and manifest receive favor, the living and deceased attain felicity.

Today, reverently heeding the imperial edict, we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites, ascending and recommending the soul of [Name], advancing them to purity and stillness, aiding the suffering and forlorn, that all equally attain the realm of life. Now, the recitation of the precious chapters has completed seven cycles. Overflowing with profound grace, we proclaim and transmit below to the nether courts for enactment.

We humbly pray that universal compassionate radiance descend, beholding our sincerity. May all swiftly harmonize with beneficent grace, forever relying upon this mercy.

A memorial document is prepared; we now respectfully proclaim it.

*Proclamation of the Memorial*
We reverently invoke the Transcendent Brahma-Auxiliary Deva, the Swift Talisman Envoy, to swiftly emerge in ordered ranks and receive this official document.

*Proclamation of the Pass*
Burning and transformation.

*Attending the Scriptures: Opening the Sutra*
*Eulogy for Seating*
*Request to Turn the Dharma Wheel*
*Master Inscribes the Sutra*
*Assembly Recites the Sutra to Completion*
*Attending the Scriptures: Dedication*
*Chant Upon Rising from the Seat*

Proceeding in void-step, circumambulating to the Gate of Gen, offering incense.

*The Master intones the White Text:*
We humbly recall: dwelling in the Gen position, one presides over the august Palace of Numinous Treasure; virtue governs the Ghost Gate, diffusing the qi of boundless space. Bestowing the great power of rebirth, extending the divine efficacy of revivification.

Today, reverently heeding the imperial edict, we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites, ascending and recommending the soul of [Name], advancing them to purity and stillness, aiding the suffering and forlorn, that all equally attain the realm of life. Now, the recitation of the precious chapters has completed eight cycles. Respectfully proclaiming the decree of grace, we pray for the deliverance of divine souls.

We humbly pray for the special bestowal of divine radiance, that they harmonize with the decree of deliverance. May the stagnant and lingering souls be liberated, the deceased be elevated. Spared from sinking into the Nine Nether Realms, may they transcend the Three Realms.

A memorial document is prepared; we now respectfully proclaim it.

*Proclamation of the Memorial*

We reverently invoke the Celestial Envoy of the High Void and Luminous Heavens, hasten forth from your ranks, and respectfully receive this official document.

*Proclamation of the Memorial*
*Burning of the Document*
*Attendants prepare the scriptures*
*Opening of the scriptures*
*Arrangement of the ritual seats*
*Chanting of the praises*
*Invocation to turn the Wheel of the Dharma*
*The master inscribes the scriptures*
*The assembly completes the recitation*
*Attendants dedicate the merit*
*Chanting of the closing hymn*
*Procession in the Void-Stepping Rite*
Proceeding to the Southern Palace, we offer incense.

The master presents the memorial:

We humbly acknowledge that the radiant virtue of the Southern Palace governs the authority over life and death; its transformative teachings of the Southern Realm weigh the balance of sin and blessing. May all who suffer in the depths of sinking receive the grace of liberation.

Today, reverently heeding the imperial edict, we solemnly perform the Jade Register rites, ascending and recommending the soul of [Name], advancing them to purity and stillness, aiding the suffering and forlorn, that all equally attain the realm of life. Now, the recitation of the precious chapters has completed nine cycles. We broadly proclaim the profound grace, that it be honored and enacted in the Nether Realms below.

We humbly pray that, embodying the Divine Emperor’s love for life, great compassion be extended to save the afflicted. May divine souls be delivered from the Nine Nights, and the forlorn spirits pass through the layered barriers.

A memorial document is prepared; we now respectfully proclaim it.

*Proclamation of the Memorial*

We reverently invoke the Celestial Envoy of the Heaven of No-Thought, No-Attachment, and No-Desire, hasten forth from your ranks, and respectfully receive this official document.

*Proclamation of the Memorial*
*Burning of the Document*

Upon attending the sutra, sighing the sutra, and thrice hearing the sutra,
the master gathers the sutra with praise—
gathering the sutra to attain the Dao, following mindfulness to rebirth.
Boundless mysterious merit, limitless grace and blessings.
We humbly pray to dissolve karmic entanglements of the past,
and meet conditions for the future.
May none fall into the Three Wretched Realms,
and all be freed from the Eight Difficulties.
We bow our heads in reverence, taking refuge in the supreme Dao-Treasure.
Gathering the sutra to attain the Dao, following mindfulness to rebirth.
Measureless vast grace, boundless sagely power.
We humbly pray that the wheel of rebirth be stilled,
and the bonds of karmic entanglement forever severed.
May the dark realms shine with radiance,
and divine souls undergo refinement.
We bow our heads in reverence, taking refuge in the supreme Sutra-Treasure.
Gathering the sutra to attain the Dao, following mindfulness to rebirth.
Infinite good affinity, inexhaustible wondrous power.
We humbly pray that the Four Offices flow without obstruction,
and the Nine Bureaus silently communicate.
May souls ascend the Vermilion Mound,
and spirits wander the Purple Palace.
We bow our heads in reverence, taking refuge in the supreme Master-Treasure.

Returning the spirits and burning incense.
Celestial spirits and officials, golden lads and jade maidens,
the Five Emperors and Five Peaks’ immortals and perfected,
the Three Qi’s true deities, the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords,
heavenly immortals and earthly immortals, the Five Numinous Incense Officials—
now summon and gather the ten directions’ true qi,
naturally giving rise to golden liquid, cinnabar, and azure mushrooms.
The hundred numinous perfected hosts converge here,
before the incense burner.
May your servant study the Dao and attain the Dao,
seek immortality and attain immortality.
May the ten directions’ immortal lads and jade maidens
attend the incense smoke,
and swiftly convey the sincerity of your servant’s earlier entreaties
directly to the presence of the Supreme Perfected Three Treasures,
the Jade Emperor of the Vast Heaven,
the Heavenly Worthy of Eastern Relief from Suffering,
and the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Emperor of the Dao.

Giving thanks to the divine kings.
Reiterating the dharma-ranks,
your servant, [Name], humbly addresses the ten directions’ boundless flying celestial divine kings and envoys,
the flying celestial officials and soldiers, the sagely hosts.
We reverently gaze upon the auspicious light,
humbly awaiting your penetrating insight.
For the ninefold recitation of the Life-Generating Scripture,
we rely entirely upon the grace of reverent chanting;
through the Three Vehicles’ expounding of wonders,
we fully inherit the merit of opening and pardoning.
Yesterday, in reverent compliance with the imperial decree,
we solemnly performed the Jade Register Great Retreat,
ascending and recommending the spirit of [Name],
to rise to the realm of blessings,
and broadly aiding the forlorn souls to equally attain the realm of life.
Earlier, leading the assembly to ascend the altar,
we turned and chanted the *Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Jade Chapters of the Numinous Treasure of the Cavernous Mystery*,
completing nine cycles.
Without the sagely creation, how could perfection be achieved?
We exhaust our humble devotion, redoubling our sincerity.
The memorial document was recited with reverence,
and respectfully proclaimed in full.
Proclamation of the Memorial.
Proclamation of the Pass.
The memorial document has been proclaimed;
we trust it reaches your profound wisdom.
We humbly pray that you oversee the deliverance of beings,
and, hearing their cries, hasten to save the suffering;
that you turn your radiant chariot and return,
fulfilling our prayers to deliver the world.
We cannot express our reverence,
nor our longing.
We, [Names], bow again in reverent devotion,
and with one heart, respectfully send you forth.
Retreat concluded.
Cloud chariots depart.

Upon the conclusion of the offering by fire,
we, your humble servants [Names], in our proper ranks,
respectfully address the Sovereign of the Mystic Teaching of the Cavernous Mystery,
the Jade Clarity August Emperor Dao Lord,
the Three Heavens’ Sovereign and Orthodox Unity Celestial Master Perfected Lord,
the Sovereign of the Numinous Treasure and Perfected Lord of the Canonical Preceptor,
the Perfected Lord Great Dharma Master Supervising the Retreat,
the Perfected Lord Immortal Duke of the Left Palace of the Supreme Ultimate,
the Perfected Lord Grand Scribe of the Nine Provinces’ Immortals,
the Sovereign of the Teaching for Humans and Devas and Perfected Lord Fuqiu of the Canopy,
and the successive preceptor lords of the Pure Tenuity, Numinous Treasure, Dao Virtue, and Orthodox Unity traditions.

We reverently beseech your compassionate regard,
that you deign to turn your penetrating insight upon us.
We, having ascended the altar and recited the *Jade Chapters of the Nine Heavens’ Life-Generating Numinous Treasure of the Cavernous Mystery*,
have ascended and recommended the spirit of [Name],
advancing it to the realm of blessedness,
extending aid to the suffering and departed,
and universally guiding all toward the attainment of life’s true domain.
Through your sovereign oversight,
the nine cycles have been completed.
Yet we fear the unsettled state of form and spirit,
and dread the errors that may arise in thought and intention.
We humbly implore your forbearance,
that the good fruit may be brought to fulfillment.

We pray that the imperial presence remain unwavering,
and that Heaven incline its will toward us.
May those receiving rebirth be delivered,
their souls all freed from the dark yin realms;
may responsive encounters with the numinous be fulfilled,
and the work of perfect harmony be wholly achieved.
We presume upon your august severity,
and in our lowly devotion,
are overwhelmed with awe and reverent gratitude.
Thus we respectfully submit.

Retreat concluded.

The Rite of the Cloud Chariot and the Jade Register for the Nurturance of Life through the Recitation of Transformative Scriptures is now concluded.

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongxuan Section*, *Weiyi* (Ritual Propriety) category.

**Morning Audience**
The master stands in order within the hall.

**Ritual Proceedings**
